description.zh-cn: 法轮功的创始人及精神领袖，自1992年起在中国公开传授法轮功，1999年遭中国政府镇压后，现定居于美国。
description.en: Founder and spiritual leader of Falun Gong, who began publicly teaching the practice in China in 1992. After the suppression by the Chinese government in 1999, he now resides in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 一个由李洪志创立的身心修炼系统，以“真、善、忍”为核心原则。1990年代在中国广泛传播，但自1999年7月起受到中华人民共和国政府的镇压。
description.en: A spiritual practice for mind and body founded by Li Hongzhi, with 'Truthfulness, Compassion, Forbearance' as its core principles. It spread widely in China in the 1990s but has been suppressed by the Government of the People's Republic of China since July 1999.

en: Government of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政当局，自1999年起将法轮功定义为威胁并对其进行全面镇压。
description.en: The ruling authority of China, which has defined Falun Gong as a threat and carried out a comprehensive suppression against it since 1999.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党，因法轮功的迅速发展和意识形态差异而将其视为威胁，并发起了镇压运动。
description.en: The ruling party of China, which viewed Falun Gong as a threat due to its rapid growth and ideological differences, and initiated a campaign of suppression against it.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央总书记，他将法轮功视为对共产党的威胁，并最终决定于1999年发起对法轮功的全面镇压。
description.en: Then-General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, who viewed Falun Gong as a threat to the Communist Party and ultimately decided to launch the full-scale suppression against it in 1999.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国国务院总理，在425上访事件中采取了较为温和的和解立场，但其立场最终被江泽民拒绝。
description.en: Then-Premier of the State Council of China, who adopted a more moderate and conciliatory stance during the April 25 Appeal, but his position was ultimately rejected by Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 李洪志的妻子。
description.en: The wife of Li Hongzhi.

description.zh-cn: 李洪志的出生地，位于中国吉林省。
description.en: Birthplace of Li Hongzhi, located in Jilin Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 李洪志自1998年以来以永久居民身份定居的国家。
description.en: The country where Li Hongzhi has resided as a permanent resident since 1998.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪80年代至90年代在中国兴起的大众性气功健身运动，为法轮功的传播提供了社会背景。
description.en: A mass qigong fitness movement in China during the 1980s and 1990s, which provided the social context for the spread of Falun Gong.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国公安部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部
en: Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国的国家警察机关。在镇压前曾与李洪志保持正面关系，1999年7月29日对其发布全国通缉令。
description.en: The national police agency of China. It maintained positive relations with Li Hongzhi before the suppression and issued a nationwide wanted notice for him on July 29, 1999.

description.zh-cn: 法轮功的主要指导书籍，由李洪志撰写，于1994年首次出版。
description.en: The main instructional book of Falun Gong, written by Li Hongzhi and first published in 1994.

description.zh-cn: 1999年4月25日，超过一万名法轮功学员到北京和平上访，该事件被视为中国政府决定全面镇压法轮功的导火索之一。
description.en: On April 25, 1999, over 10,000 Falun Gong practitioners peacefully appealed in Beijing. The event is considered one of the triggers for the Chinese government's decision to launch a full-scale suppression.

description.zh-cn: 一个促进全球警察合作的国际组织。该组织拒绝了中国政府就通缉李洪志一事提供合作的请求。
description.en: An international organization that facilitates worldwide police cooperation. It rejected the Chinese government's request for cooperation regarding the wanted notice for Li Hongzhi.

description.zh-cn: 一家总部位于纽约的美国舞蹈与音乐公司，李洪志担任其艺术总监。
description.en: A U.S.-based dance and music company headquartered in New York, for which Li Hongzhi serves as Artistic Director.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国驻法国大使馆

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国驻法国大使馆
en: Embassy of the People's Republic of China in France

description.zh-cn: 1995年邀请李洪志赴法国传授功法，标志着法轮功开始向海外传播。
description.en: Invited Li Hongzhi to teach Falun Gong in France in 1995, marking the beginning of the practice's spread overseas.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性大流行病。李洪志对此发表言论，称病毒是针对中共而来，并宣称中国已有数亿人因此死亡。
description.en: A global pandemic. Li Hongzhi commented on it, stating the virus targeted the CCP and claiming that hundreds of millions of people had died from it in China.

description.zh-cn: 一家与法轮功相关的多语种电视台，曾采访李洪志并报导其关于疫情的争议性言论。
description.en: A multilingual television station associated with Falun Gong, which interviewed Li Hongzhi and reported his controversial statements on the pandemic.

description.zh-cn: 李洪志是法轮功的创始人，自1992年5月起在中国公开传授该功法。
description.en: Li Hongzhi is the founder of Falun Gong and began publicly teaching the practice in China in May 1992.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本，李瑞是李洪志的妻子，两人于1980年代结婚。
description.en: According to the text, Li Rui is the wife of Li Hongzhi; they married in the 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 李洪志于1951年5月13日出生于吉林省公主岭市（原怀德县）。
description.en: Li Hongzhi was born on May 13, 1951, in Gongzhuling City (formerly Huide County), Jilin Province.

description.zh-cn: 自1998年起，李洪志以永久居民身份定居美国。
description.en: Since 1998, Li Hongzhi has lived in the United States as a permanent resident.

description.zh-cn: 李洪志担任神韵艺术团的艺术总监。
description.en: Li Hongzhi serves as the Artistic Director of Shen Yun Performing Arts.

description.zh-cn: 李洪志撰写并出版了法轮功的核心著作《转法轮》。
description.en: Li Hongzhi wrote and published 'Zhuan Falun', the core text of Falun Gong.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共总书记江泽民将法轮功视为对共产党的威胁，并主导发起了对法轮功的全面镇压。
description.en: Then-CCP General Secretary Jiang Zemin viewed Falun Gong as a threat to the Communist Party and led the launch of a full-scale suppression against it.

description.zh-cn: 自1999年7月起，中国政府将法轮功取缔，并展开了全面的镇压运动。
description.en: Starting from July 1999, the Chinese government banned Falun Gong and launched a comprehensive suppression campaign.

description.zh-cn: 自1999年镇压开始，中国政府将李洪志视为主要目标，对其进行媒体攻击并发布通缉令。
description.en: Since the suppression began in 1999, the Chinese government has targeted Li Hongzhi as a primary figure, launching media attacks against him and issuing a wanted notice.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国公安部

description.zh-cn: 1999年7月29日，中国公安部向全国下达了对李洪志的通缉令。
description.en: On July 29, 1999, China's Ministry of Public Security issued a nationwide wanted notice for Li Hongzhi.

description.zh-cn: 中国的“气功热”为法轮功在1990年代的迅速传播提供了有利的社会环境。
description.en: The 'Qigong fever' in China provided a favorable social environment for the rapid spread of Falun Gong in the 1990s.

description.zh-cn: 425上访事件被江泽民视为对中共政权的挑战，促使他下定决心全面镇压法轮功。
description.en: The April 25 Appeal was viewed by Jiang Zemin as a challenge to the CCP's authority, prompting his decision to launch a full-scale suppression of Falun Gong.

description.zh-cn: 在425上访事件当天，时任总理朱镕基会见了法轮功学员代表，并采取了温和处理方式，促成了事件的和平解决。
description.en: On the day of the April 25 Appeal, then-Premier Zhu Rongji met with Falun Gong representatives and adopted a moderate approach, which led to a peaceful resolution of the incident.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国公安部

description.zh-cn: 国际刑警组织拒绝了中国公安部就通缉李洪志一事提供合作的请求，理由是缺乏刑事罪行证据。
description.en: Interpol rejected the request from China's Ministry of Public Security for cooperation on the wanted notice for Li Hongzhi, citing a lack of evidence of criminal offenses.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国驻法国大使馆

description.zh-cn: 1995年，中国驻法国大使馆邀请李洪志赴巴黎举办讲法班，开启了其海外传法活动。
description.en: In 1995, the Chinese Embassy in France invited Li Hongzhi to hold a lecture seminar in Paris, which initiated his overseas teaching activities.

description.zh-cn: 李洪志对疫情发表评论，称其为“中共病毒”，旨在淘汰中共及其追随者，并声称中国有数亿人因此死亡。
description.en: Li Hongzhi commented on the pandemic, calling it the 'CCP virus' aimed at eliminating the CCP and its followers, and claimed hundreds of millions had died from it in China.

description.zh-cn: 新唐人电视台曾于2004年采访李洪志，并在2023年报导了他关于中国疫情死亡人数的说法，扩大了他的言论传播。
description.en: New Tang Dynasty Television interviewed Li Hongzhi in 2004 and reported his claims about the COVID-19 death toll in China in 2023, amplifying the dissemination of his statements.
